We are currently working with the City o: After much thought and deliberation, PCFMA has decided to close the Richmond Main Street Farmers' Market. We enjoyed operating this market for the community, but found that it was not serving the needs of the farmers, the customers, nor the extended neighborhood in the way we wished. Please visit your nearest farmers' market so you can continue to get quality produce from certified California growers. Thank you for your support!
